name: Riding Club Championships
description: Riding Club Championships is a horse riding game focusing on online competitions. Compete in show jumping, barrel racing, pole bending, agility and jump agility. You can play alone, against friends, in ranked games against random players, or in our weekly tournament. You can even create your own courses and share them with the world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7 (SP1 required), 8, 10 Processor: Dual Core CPU 2.0 GHz (Intel Core 2 Duo or Athlon X2) or better Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated graphics card (NVidia GeForce 8800 GT or better) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7 (SP1 required), 8, 10 Processor: Quad Core CPU 2.0 GHz (Core i5) or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated graphics card (GeForce GTX 650 / AMD Radeon HD 7770 series or better). DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews.review_text: Fantastic horse game where you can actuallly compete live against other players. There are so many different courses covering show jumping and tricky twisty agility courses which are well thought out and well laid out. Varying degrees of difficulty for new players to pro's. And the horses actually do lead changes Multiple colors for your horses, probably the widest range I have ever seen on a horse game I adore this game, I've played when it was a stand alone, then since day 1 from the Facebook release and will now play here too. Yes, it has microtransactions, but unless you really cannot wait to advance, you can quite easily play for free, I reached max level without payig a cent.  There is a weekly competition that's great fun and you have to earn a place in the final on Sundays, pretty good prizes too. The action points run out a bit fast, but there are upgrades that you can use to extend them and make them fill faster. There are things to do that don't need them, Course editor where you cn make and publish your own courses, or just save them to practise on, challenge your friends with the free social tickets you get each day when you log in or just chat while they refill. Overall gets 11/10 from me
